award_title: E-RISE Rll: Arkansas Smart Transportation Research Incubator through Data Engineering and Science
subject: ML pipelines across 5 institutions
body:
Getting ML and data pipelines to work across 5 different institutions sounds like dependency hell on expert mode.

I built Ouro after hitting the same wallâ€”my computational stuff didn't outlive the paper. It's a way to package research code and data so it actually runs elsewhere, not just on your setup.

Worth a quick chat? It's holiday season, so no rush.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
